description:
This cozy Williamsburg sanctuary is just blocks from the L Train Graham stop and only 10 minutes to Manhattan. My place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Dishwasher and washer and dryer in unit. Private entrance, piano, guitar, Netflix, internet, location, everything you could want!

Great location and great apartment!

Steps from Williamsburg best restaurants and bars. Just 2 stops from Bedford Ave. shopping and yoga studios nearby
name: Williamsburg Brooklyn Sanctuary
review:
Danielle's place is amazingly located to Brooklyn's best shops and restaurants. We found being on the L train line so useful.
She was very communicative and responded to all our questions quickly.
The place itself is compact and cosy - all you need when out and about all day.
